item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“paymon, post:35, topic:405717”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=502707.msg3687186#msg3687186 date=1311912491]

This is fucking terrible, holy shit. I’ve never seen such a leeched server with content this bad and stupid in all of my time in rsps.
[/quote]I second this; everything I’ve seen him add [that’s actually his] is just terrible quality, everything else is just leeched. The only thing that I’ve seen him actually add is the skin colors; because that’s so hard.

What ever, wernt you in one of my previous team?[/quote]I was, and that was a mistake; you had me fix simple command errors.
Then when I left you begged me to stay.

item.title: PI- CrusadeX, Already Hosted 30+ players online
item.dc:creator: @Pull_Ups Pull Ups
item.description:
@Pull_Ups wrote:

What is your real name: Nathan
What position are you applying for: Forum Moderator/Webmaster
How much experience do you have in this field: 2 - 3 years
Why should we choose you: If the forums are already setup and connected to the webhost and domain (if you have one) I can do the rest. I will willingly deal with any and all community issues regarding accounts. Some issues may include password recovery, reports, etc. If the forums are not set up yet, I will create them for you, but I will NOT set it up to a webhost, that is something I do NOT like doing.
In less then one line tell us what is special about you: I’m an extremely grammar nazi who has a passion for RSPS’ and loves forums.
MSN: natewentworth@hotmail.com
Skype: natewentworth

Read full topic
